_meanings:
Causing to arise or
spring up.

{@--2@} Rising (as of 
luminaries); {#iMduM navotTAnamiveMdumatyE#} <ls>R. 6. 31</ls>
newly risen.

{@--5@} ({%a%}) Effort, exertion,
activity; {#medaSCedakfSodaraM laGu#} 
{#BavatyutTAnayogyaM vapuH#} <ls>Ś. 2. 5</ls>; {#°SIlaH#} <ls>Dk. 153</ls> 
disposed to work; <ls>Mv. 6. 23</ls>; {#yadyutTAnaM#}
{#Bavetsaha#} <ls>Ms. 9. 215</ls>, effort (for money),
acquisition of property. ({%b%}) Manly
exertion, manhood.

{@--13@}
A shed where sacrifices are offered.

the eleventh day
in the light fortnight of Kārttika
when Viṣṇu rises from his four
months' sleep (also called {#praboDinI#}).
